body.p:
provides support for customizing the WebHelp output to suit your specific needs. The WebHelp system includes several output variants that can be customized in numerous ways:
WebHelp Responsive (with or without feedback enabled) - Features a very flexible layout and is designed to adapt to any device and screen size to provide an optimal viewing and interaction experience. It is based upon the Bootstrap responsive front-end framework and is available for DITA document types. The WebHelp Responsive with Feedback variant allows your users to add comments to your output. You also have customization options, including ways to create and customize the templates used to create this type of output.
WebHelp Classic (with or without feedback enabled) - Designed for desktop systems and features a familiar tri-pane layout. You can use this system to publish DITA and DocBook document types. The WebHelp Classic with Feedback variant allows your users to add comments to your output.
